meanings.sent1: Her garrulity made it hard to focus during class.
meanings.sent2: His garrulity at the party annoyed everyone around him.
meanings.sent3: The garrulity of the parrot entertained the guests with its constant chatter.
meanings.sent4: The garrulity of the stream filled the peaceful forest with constant noise.
meanings.sent5: The garrulity of the old radio host was legendary among listeners.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being garrulous
meanings.sent1: The garrulity of the group was evident in their lively conversations.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't hide her garrulity, always eager to share stories with anyone who would listen.
meanings.sent3: The garrulity of the town crier added a touch of humor to the daily announcements.
meanings.sent4: The garrulity of the wind whispered secrets through the trees.
meanings.sent5: His garrulity in sharing his adventures made him a favorite among the children.
